notesStmt.note: Parchment slightly inflexible, with creases. Uneven trimming at lower edge and, in part, losses of printing at head. Dark at edges and outer end (dirt and slight damp mottling). Usage and rust stains, a smear of green pigment on verso. One small loss to rodent at outer end.
